title: message display
content:
Suddenly my e-mails are showing in Thunderbird as tabs rather than listings. What have I done? How do I rectify it? I looked in display, and there didn't seem to be anything there to help me.

Thanks.
creator: BigMart

title: Issue with Thunderbird Account Setup - Credentials Not Displayed
content:
I am experiencing an issue while setting up my account in Thunderbird. After entering my email and password during the Account Setup process, the "Enter Credentials" window appears with a URL in the address bar. However, the window does not display any content.

I have attached a screenshot for your reference.

Could you please assist me in resolving this issue?

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards, Vasyl
creator: liams02413

title: Mozilla Log In, Google Email, "That's and Error" "That's all we know" Can't clear pop-up to proceed
content:
I am attempting to log in to a new Mozilla Thunderbird account. I am being asked to log in with Google. (I would rather not.) When I attempt to log in WITH Google credentials, I get the message above; PAGE SIZE Pop up from Google "That's an error" "That's all we know." I cannot proceed. I cannot clear the pop up without restarting.

That's it.

Thanks for your help.
creator: ThomCad3
